item.title: core fix (bug FOR-246,FOR-431)
item.description:
core fix by DC (fixes bug FOR-246,FOR-431)
:
Fix various bugs with Lucene search. Thanks to Florian G. Haas.

item.title: build fix
item.description:
build fix by DC :
Change Ant build property name "version" to "forrest.version" to prevent collisions with other build systems when using the Ant "import" task.

item.title: core fix (bug FOR-330)
item.description:
core fix by DB (fixes bug FOR-330)
:
Fixed quotes in forrest.bat so forrest can be in a directory with spaces. Thanks to Gary Feldman.

item.title: core fix
item.description:
core fix by DC :
Fix some public identifiers (for DTD-v2.0) which were still pointing to old versions of DTDs.
